name: Disable Automatic Theme & Plugin Updates
author: Jake Spurlock

sections.description:
At the core of this plugin, it is simply using the build in filters to disable automatic theme and plugin updates.

add_filter( 'plugins_auto_update_enabled', '__return_false' );
add_filter( 'themes_auto_update_enabled', '__return_false' );

If you are interested in contributing to this plugin, all issues should be addressed on Github. Pull requests welcome.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload /disabe-plugin-theme-auto-updates.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Or, install via the plugin repository.
sections.changelog:
0.1.5

  • Fix the tested up to version.

0.1.4

  • Initial release.
  • Added some build tools.

0.1.0

Let’s kick this off.
